additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: INGREDIENTS: SUGAR, COCOA BUTTER, FULL CREAM MILK, MILK SOLIDS, COCOA MASS, GLUCOSE SYRUP, INVERT SUGAR, SWEETENED CONDENSED MILK, VEGETABLE FAT, POPPING CANDY (COTNAINS MILK), WHEAT FLOUR, GOLDEN SYRUP, EMULSIFIERS (SOY LECITHIN, 476, 492, 471, SUNFLOWER LECITHIN), COCOA POWDER, THICKENER (1401 (FROM WHEAT)), ACIDITY REGULATORS (330, 331), PINEAPPLE, STRAWBERRIES, PINEAPPLE JUICE, APPLES, SALT, COLOURS (100, 141, 160a, 163, 171), FLAVOURS, VEGETABLE GUM (414), GLAZING AGENT (VEGETABLE OIL, 901, 903), RAISING AGENT (500), ENZYME (CONTAINS WHEAT), CORNSTARCH.

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: Milk, Soy (DAIRY MILK FREDDO, MILKY TOP FREDDO, STRAWBERRY FREDDO, CARAMELLO KOALA, POPPING CANDY FREDDO and TROPICAL PINEAPPLE FREDDO); MILK, WHEAT, GLUTEN, SOY (MARVELLOUS CREATIONS and CHOMP). PRODUCT CONTAINS MILK CHOCOLATE (68%), WHITE CHOCOLATE (4.0%), CHOC COMPOUND (4.0%). MILK CHOCOLATE CONTAINS COCOA SOLIDS 27%, MILK SOLIDS MINIMUM 24%. WHITE CHOCOLATE CONTAINS COCOA SOLIDS 23%, MILK SOLIDS 31%. CHOC COMPOUND CONTAINS COCOA SOLIDS 7%, MILK SOLIDS 14%.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present Tree Nuts, May Be Present Peanuts, Contains Gluten, Contains Soy, Contains Wheat, Contains Milk

additionalProperty.name: Country Of Origin
additionalProperty.value: Made in Australia from Imported and Local Ingredients

description: Cadbury Favourites Party Edition. A delicious variety of chocolate pieces with something for everyone!A variety of chocolate pieces
